description: The Dr. Cheng & Feng Research Scholarship is open to full-time students who are declared Management Information Systems majors with demonstrated research and leadership abilities. Eligibility Requirements Declared Management Information Systems majors Demonstrated research and leadership abilities Full-time students Selection Process Preference is given to students demonstrating active participation in undergraduate research

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
